# StatusDot Component

### StatusDot

**Exports:**
- `StatusDot` - Status indicator dot component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { StatusDot } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<div class="space-y-6">
	<StatusDot state="QUEUED" />
	<StatusDot state="BUILDING" />
	<StatusDot state="ERROR" />
	<StatusDot state="READY" />
	<StatusDot state="CANCELED" />
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/status-dot for full documentation and examples.
